scripts.test:env: npm i && powershell Remove-Item src/test/mongolog.* && concurrently "mongod --logpath src/test/mongolog.json --quiet --port 27017 --dbpath C:/data/db" "npx nodemon ./src/main.ts test"
scripts.test:seed: npm i && powershell Remove-Item src/test/mongolog.* && concurrently "mongod --logpath src/test/mongolog.json --quiet --port 27017 --dbpath C:/data/db" "node src/test/seed.ts" "npx nodemon ./src/main.ts test"
scripts.test:jest: npm i && powershell Remove-Item src/test/mongolog.* && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "mongod --logpath src/test/mongolog.json --quiet --port 27017 --dbpath C:/data/db" "node src/test/seed.ts" "npx jest --forceExit && npx kill-port 27017"
